Paragraph: Consequently , these findings suggest that the design and synthesis of new random terpolymers is a promising way to broaden the absorption of their parent polymers and that optimization of the composition of random terpolymers is critically important to maximize the PSC performance.

* "parent polymers" - This term does not refer directly to the material name, but rather to the broader category of polymers.
* "PSC performance" - While "PSC" may refer to a specific type of performance, it is not a material name.
